page.title: 13PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: This is how you play{Three Bad Eggs. Player 1 has a ball. Players 2,3,4 etc. pick a subject and choose a type of the subject. For instance 'motorbikes':Suzuki,Honda,Yamaha etc. They tell Player 1 what types they have chosen, but not who chose them. Player 1 then picks one of the types and throws the ball in the air. the player whose type it is runs to catch the ball and shouts stop. Meanwhile Player 1 runs forward with the rest. When they have stopped the player who has caught the ball takes three steps forward and throws the ball at a person's legs. If it misses he has got a {bad egg},if it hits then the person hit is "it" plus a{bad egg}. If you have three{bad eggs}then you go through the{torture machine}three times, which involves tickling. Then you start again.
